description:
This course broadly covers advanced topics in econometrics. The focus is on
time series econometrics and financial econometrics. However, panel data
and asymptotic theory are also tackled in this course ‐in more depth than in
‘Econometrics’. This course mixes theory and applied work:
theoretical foundations are covered, and the applications of the theory in
real life are analysed.
title: Advanced Econometrics
prerequisite: YSS2211 Econometrics or with the permission of the instructor.
